entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 04:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -29.0°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -33.1°C
Wind: SSE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 29. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 29. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
